course.subject: CENG
course.name: Environmental Impact Assessment and Management Systems
course.description: This course will review the methods for assessing environmental impacts.  Impact and management systems will be discussed in the context of both HK and international environmental legislation, which incorporates Licensing, BATNEEC, integrated pollution control, environmental management and auditing systems based on ISO 14000.  Actual case studies from the process industries will be discussed.
course.prerequisites: CENG 1700 or CIVL 1140
